original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, users as u WHERE pl.RelatedPostId = p.Id AND u.Id= c.UserId AND c.PostId = p.Id AND ph.PostId = p.Id AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-11 12:25:05' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 13:43:09' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=14 AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-06 03:14:53' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Reputation<=491 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.DownVotes<=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-11 12:25:05' AND CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 13:43:09'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 14
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2.PostId=E3.RelatedPostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) >= 1 AND CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) <= 491 AND users.DownVotes = 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E2E3.UserId=E5.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-06 03:14:53'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E5E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2E3E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E2E3E5.PostId=E4.PostId)
